items.text: shortish, doesn't climb as much as expected as he aims a pull at it. Hits the flap of his pads (pitched outside leg, so no lbw appeal), and pops up to short third man
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chandimal, no run

items.text: short outside off, stops on him and his attempted slap through point rolls slowly to the left of extra-cover
length ball close to off stump, defended to backward point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Gunaratne, no run

items.text: full on middle and leg, flicked to long-on
short of a length, keeps low, flicked to midwicket
short of a length, nips in towards off, punched to cover
full, shaping in from outside off, pushed out through the covers
was that off the bat. Doesn't look like. At least to the umpire anyway. Short ball that pitches on off, Chandimal jumps up and tries to flick but the ball hits the back thigh and goes to the keeper
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Chandimal, no run

items.text: punches a length ball to long-on
short and wide, cut to point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chandimal, no run

items.text: short of a length, pitches outside leg, flicked against the line to midwicket
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chandimal, no run

items.text: back of a length, opens the face to backward point. Gunaratne wants the single but is sent back. There's a direct throw at the bowler's end and they eventually take the single off the deflection

items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Gunaratne, no run

items.preText: Mustafizur's name has come up at the auction.
items.text: back of a length outside off, dropped to the cover region

items.preText: Daredevils have made an opening bid. Mumbai Indians then join in the bidding.
items.text: short of a length, closes the face as the ball jags away and gets a leading edge to third man
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chandimal, 1 leg bye

items.text: short, wide, cut hard to point
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Chandimal, no run

items.text: short of good length, pulled between wide long-on and deep midwicket

full, angling in and hits the pad. Seems momentarily as if there's an inside edge. The umpire raises his finger and Gunaratne reviews it. Swings in the air and comes in further off the deck to gets past the attempt at a flick. So no inside edge. And it's clipping leg stump

dismissal.text: DAS Gunaratne lbw b Rubel Hossain 6 (14b 0x4 0x6) SR: 42.85

items.preText: Mustafizur has been sold to Mumbai Indians for INR 2.2crore. Sunrisers didn't exercise their Right To Match card.
items.text: short of a length, angled across, pats it away through the cover and point region
items.postText: Sena : "Really disappointing batting. You'd expect teams to be scoring at 7-8 an over minimum with 2 proper batsmen at the crease and 6 overs to go from any other fill member side. Sri lanka's Run rate has continually dropped throughout the innings. In a day and age where 280's are considered par Sri Lanka never seem to get the right approach to even reach 250"

items.text: short of a length, comes into him and hits the pad as he tries to get on top and flick. The ball's hit the pad off an inside edge and lobbed towards point. They attempt a quick single and then take another one off the deflection from a direct hit

items.preText: Javed Khan Shai: "Hey Akshay, any update about Shakib's injury? " Nope, not yet. Will keep you posted as and when an update trickles in.
items.text: strikes the pad with a sharp incomer and goes up in appeal. Missing leg perhaps. Inside edge as well
